sentences.en: Can you lend me a fiver?
sentences.cn: 你能借我五英镑吗？

sentences.en: Can you lend me a hand with this?
sentences.cn: 这个你能帮我一把吗？

sentences.en: Can you lend me five quid?
sentences.cn: 你借给我五镑钱行吗？

sentences.en: he lent his name and prestige to the organizers of the project.
sentences.cn: 他以自己的名义和声望支持这项计划的组 织者。

sentences.en: Her denials of this charge served merely to lend it credence.
sentences.cn: 她对这一指控的矢口否认,反倒更使人相信这一指控是真的.

sentences.en: However you dress it up, a bank only exists to lend money.
sentences.cn: 无论你如何粉饰，银行就是为了放贷而生的。

sentences.en: I know better than to lend him any money.
sentences.cn: 我知道不该把钱借给他.

sentences.en: I'd be glad to lend a hand.
sentences.cn: 我很乐意帮忙。

sentences.en: I'm sorry, I can't lend you anything — I don't have a red cent.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉, 我不能借钱给你——我身无分文.

sentences.en: If you lend him money, you can kiss it good - bye.
sentences.cn: 如果你借给他钱, 你就甭想他还你.

sentences.en: Lend an ear to him. It'seems that he knows the whole story.
sentences.cn: 仔细听他讲, 他似乎知道全部内情.

sentences.en: Lend me a hand to shift this box, will you ?
sentences.cn: 来帮一下忙,把这箱子搬开, 好 吗 ?

sentences.en: She took a vow never to lend money to anyone again.
sentences.cn: 她发誓绝不再借钱给别人.

sentences.en: The bank is reassessing its criteria for lending money.
sentences.cn: 银行正在重新评估其贷款标准。

sentences.en: The company will lend you money on very favourable terms.
sentences.cn: 这家公司将以非常优惠的条件借钱给你.

sentences.en: The company will lend you money on very unfavourable terms.
sentences.cn: 这家公司会以非常刻薄的条件借钱给你.

sentences.en: The hospital agreed to lend us a wheelchair.
sentences.cn: 医院同意借给我们一把轮椅。

sentences.en: the Samaritans lend their ears to those in crisis.
sentences.cn: 撒马利坦热线电话倾听求助人们的声音。

sentences.en: the Samaritans lend their ears to those in crisis.
sentences.cn: 撒马利坦热线电话倾听求助人们的声音。

sentences.en: We shall gladly lend every effort in our power toward its realization.
sentences.cn: 我们将乐意为它的实现而竭尽全力.

sentences.en: Will you lend me your jacket for a little while?
sentences.cn: 你能把上衣借给我穿一会儿吗？

phrases.phrase: lend a hand (或 a helping hand)

trans.tran_en: to give a situation, event etc a particular quality

trans.tran_cn: 借给， 贷； 提供， 给予
trans.tran_en: to give a situation, event etc a particular quality
